MoRTH entrusts different NH stretches to NHAI from time to time Development & Management of the entrusted NH requires substantial amount of funds especially when such NH stretches are not of approved programme of the Government: Therefore, it is appropriate that such entrusted stretches are brought to the notice of Board of NHAI alongwith their financial implications and then further action be taken in accordance with the directions of the Board. 2 _ In order to maintain central database of NH stretches entrusted to NHAI, in future; immediately after notification or letter of MoRTH on entrustment of any NH stretch to NHAI, Tech: Division at HQ should submit the details on PMS (an exclusive application has already been developed in PMS for this purpose): CGM(Bharatmala/Planning) will put up a consolidated proposal from time to time to the Board of NHAI for decision, including funds required for development & management, of such reaches. 3_ In case of NH stretches already taken over by NHAI, which are not included in Bharatmala Pariyojana, the details of such NH stretches may be loaded on PMS within 10 days by Tech. Divisions with the help of PDs & ROs so that CGM(Bharatmala/ Planning) consolidates all such reaches and submits a proposal to the Board in the next meeting: 32' (Alok) Member(Admn) All ROs/PDs All CGMs/ GMs at HQ to: All Members 41 RI RT HI NHAL May, part M'J Copy
